text: 🚨Privatization of public hospitals in Syria: A life-saving measure or a recipe for disaster? 🤔The Syrian government's plan to open the health sector to investment has sparked controversy. While officials claim it will improve services and reduce costs, others fear it may lead to profit-driven healthcare and worsen the crisis. 💸🏥What's your take on this? Should public hospitals be privatized or is it a risky move? Share your thoughts! 💬#Syria
